# deunicode

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a wrapper around the rust crate deunicode: https://docs.rs/deunicode/latest/deunicode/

## Installation

Requires rust compiler: https://www.rust-lang.org/

Install on mac or linux with: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh

``` r
# then in R:
devtools::install_github("Close-your-eyes/deunicode")
```
